thread.title: Cagliari 0 Juventus 2: Gonzalo Higuain bags a brace to go top of the scoring charts as Juventus close in on Serie A title

author: jhutchinson
title: Cagliari 0 Juventus 2: Gonzalo Higuain bags a brace to go top of the scoring charts as Juventus close in on Serie A title
text:
EFL HIG MAKES IT BIG Cagliari 0 Juventus 2: Gonzalo Higuain bags a brace to go top of the scoring charts as Juventus close in on Serie A title 
The Argentine striker is now level with Roma's Edin Dzeko at the top of the scoring charts as he reached 18 in the victory by JOHN HUTCHINSON
